title: 2022 Birthday event

properties.name: description
properties.value: The 2022 Birthday event was the ninth annual birthday event held in Old School RuneScape, celebrating the release of the game on the 22nd of February 2013. The event took place in Al Kharid. To begin, speak to Hassan in Al Kharid palace.

content:
2022 Birthday event
Released 16 February 2022 (Update)
End date 9 March 2022 (Update)
Reward Skis
Preceded by 2021 Birthday event
Succeeded by N/A

The 2022 Birthday event was the ninth annual birthday event held in Old School RuneScape, celebrating the release of the game on the 22nd of February 2013. The event took place in Al Kharid. To begin, speak to Hassan in Al Kharid palace.

Unlike previous birthday events, Hassan does not require the player's assistance in correcting a mistake in the proceedings, as everything is going smoothly. Instead, the player can participate in events hosted by Capt' Arnav, Larry Leprechaun, and My Arm.

Contents

  • 1 Walkthrough
    • 1.1 Larry's fishing contest
    • 1.2 My Arm's cook off
    • 1.3 Capt' Arnav's treasure hunt
    • 1.4 Finishing up
  • 2 Rewards
  • 3 Transcript
  • 4 Gallery
  • 5 Trivia

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Begin by speaking to Hassan who is walking inside the Al Kharid palace. He will give you notes and ask you to visit the other attendees.

The events can be completed in any order.

Larry's fishing contest[edit | edit source]

Talk to Larry Leprechaun, next to the Gnome Glider (in Al Kharid), to get bait and rod. Attempt to fish (and fail) in the pond next to Big Dave. Talk to Big Dave who suggests getting a different bait from Ali Morrisane. Upon talking to Ali Morrisane, he will ask you to do him a favor. Get the intelligence from Osman by answering his question with the answer "3". Bring Osman's report back to Ali Morrisane and receive the bait.

Attempt to fish once again and receive the tiny fish. Bring this to the Larry Leprechaun to complete this section.

My Arm's cook off[edit | edit source]

Talk to My Arm located just North of Ali Morrisane. Talk to each NPC in the cooking contest area. Search the cupboard and take one of each item. Fill the pot with flour and the bucket with water. Use the flour with the water to make a pizza base, then use the pizza base on the tomato first, and then use the pizza base on the cheese. Cook the pizza on the oven and use the banana on it to make a banana pizza. Use the banana pizza on My Arm; you will be interrupted by Hans. Talk to Hans. Use the oven again to burn the pizza making it even more "exotic". Use the burnt pizza on My Arm to win the cooking contest.

Capt' Arnav's treasure hunt[edit | edit source]

Meet Capt' Arnav in front of the bank of Al Kharid, he will give you a clue scroll.

First step of the clue is to dance near where the four statues meet, and face each other. Stand next to the fountain in the castle of Al Kharid and dance while facing one of the statues. Second step of the clue is a Anagram "A LEARN" which refers to Ranael, the shopkeeper of the plateskirt shop to the east. Talk to her and she will give you the next step of the clue. Third step of the clue is "I provide a means to attack. Four, to be exact."; Talk to Zeke at the scimitar shop. Answer "how many birthday balloons are on and in this building?"; right answer is "30". Bring the chest back to Capt' Arnav to finish the treasure trail.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

To finish the birthday event meet Hassan back in the Al Kharid palace and speak to him. You will be brought through a short cutscene. Once finished going through the dialogue you will receive your rewards.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Skis
  • 2 noted Half full wine jugs
  • All previous birthday event and anniversary event rewards.
  • Any previous birthday event music track.

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on an event has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the event.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Al Kharid palace during the event.

  • Zeke's shop during the event.

  • Ranael's shop during the event.

  • Ali Morrisane's stall during the event.

  • Big Dave and Larry at the oasis north of the gem trader, decked out with balloons for the festivities.

  • The cookoff area hosted by My Arm.

  • Capt Arnav recruiting adventurers to help him find his treasure chest in front of the bank.

  • Hassan debuts his new invention, the skis.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When players read Osman's report, the code 75170fc230cd88f32e475ff4087f81d9 is shown. This code is an MD5 hash for a URL that leads players to a YouTube video of Rick Astley's hit song, Never Gonna Give You Up. Such an act is known as Rickrolling, a famous Internet prank.
    • The player points out that Ali's passcode question and answer are not very secure, to which Osman replies that he knows but does not care as Ali has already paid him.
  • The clues given share the visual appearance of master clue scrolls, while the challenge scroll has the same appearance as a beginner clue scroll.
  • At the end of the event, Hassan makes a comment of how sand is coarse, rough, and gets everywhere. This is a reference to the film Star Wars: Episode II – Attack of the Clones, in which Anakin Skywalker remarks on how he does not like sand.
  • Capt' Arnav remarks that it is the 9th Anniversary of Gielinor. When the player replies that Gielinor is much older than that, he counters that it is the 9th anniversary "since we started countin'", a subtle fourth wall break.
  • When the intelligence is handed to Ali Morrisane, he says "...Chocolate? In the desert? Hm... not a terrible idea, but how to stop it from melting...?", which is a reference to Choc-ice.
  • The player can ask Hans about their account's age during the cookout, but he will be too busy to answer until the cookoff is finished.
  • When answering Zeke's challenge scroll, Zeke has special dialogue if the player answers either 0 or over 2,147,483,647 (maximum value of a signed 32-bit integer).
  • Dialogue during the event changes if the player has completed certain quests.
    • Hassan refers to the player as a friend or not a friend of Al Kharid depending on whether Prince Ali Rescue is completed.
    • Big Dave recognizes the player if Fishing Contest is completed.
    • If Troll Stronghold is completed, when Hans recommends burning the banana pizza, the player remembers Burntmeat the troll, resulting in humourous dialogue where Hans confuses Burntmeat's name for the item burnt meat.
    • My Arm talks about Snowflake if Making Friends with My Arm is completed.

rawContent: {{Infobox Event |name = 2022 Birthday event |image = [[File:2022 Birthday event.png|300px]] |release = [[16 February]] [[2022]] |update = 9th Birthday Event |removal = [[9 March]] [[2022]] |removalupdate = PJ Timer & New Broadcast Settings |reward = [[Skis]] |preceded = [[2021 Birthday event]] |succeeded = }} [[File:2022 Birthday event - Banner.png|left|120px]] The '''2022 Birthday event''' was the ninth annual [[birthday event]] held in ''[[Old School RuneScape]]'', celebrating the release of the game on the 22nd of February [[2013]]. The event took place in [[Al Kharid]]. To begin, speak to [[Hassan]] in Al Kharid palace. Unlike previous birthday events, Hassan does not require the player's assistance in correcting a mistake in the proceedings, as everything is going smoothly. Instead, the player can participate in events hosted by [[Capt' Arnav]], [[Tool Leprechaun (Larry)|Larry Leprechaun]], and [[My Arm]]. ==Walkthrough== Begin by speaking to [[Hassan]] who is walking inside the [[Al Kharid Palace|Al Kharid palace]]. He will give you [[Notes (2022 Birthday event)|notes]] and ask you to visit the other attendees. The events can be completed in any order. ===Larry's fishing contest=== Talk to [[Larry Leprechaun]], next to the Gnome Glider (in Al Kharid), to get bait and rod. Attempt to fish (and fail) in the pond next to [[Big Dave]]. Talk to [[Big Dave]] who suggests getting a different bait from [[Ali Morrisane]]. Upon talking to Ali Morrisane, he will ask you to do him a favor. Get the intelligence from [[Osman]] by answering his question with the answer "3". Bring [[Osman's report]] back to Ali Morrisane and receive the [[Desert bait|bait]]. Attempt to fish once again and receive the [[tiny fish]]. Bring this to the Larry Leprechaun to complete this section. ===My Arm's cook off=== Talk to [[My Arm]] located just North of [[Ali Morrisane]]. Talk to each NPC in the cooking contest area. Search the cupboard and take one of each item. Fill the pot with flour and the bucket with water. Use the flour with the water to make a pizza base, then use the pizza base on the tomato first, and then use the pizza base on the cheese. Cook the pizza on the oven and use the banana on it to make a banana pizza. Use the banana pizza on [[My Arm]]; you will be interrupted by [[Hans]]. Talk to Hans. Use the oven again to burn the pizza making it even more "exotic". Use the burnt pizza on [[My Arm]] to win the cooking contest. ===Capt' Arnav's treasure hunt=== Meet [[Capt' Arnav]] in front of the bank of Al Kharid, he will give you a clue scroll. First step of the clue is to dance near where the four statues meet, and face each other. Stand next to the fountain in the castle of Al Kharid and dance while facing one of the statues. Second step of the clue is a Anagram "A LEARN" which refers to [[Ranael]], the shopkeeper of the plateskirt shop to the east. Talk to her and she will give you the next step of the clue. Third step of the clue is "I provide a means to attack. Four, to be exact."; Talk to [[Zeke]] at the scimitar shop. Answer "how many birthday balloons are on and in this building?"; right answer is "30". Bring the chest back to Capt' Arnav to finish the treasure trail. ===Finishing up=== To finish the birthday event meet [[Hassan]] back in the Al Kharid palace and speak to him. You will be brought through a short cutscene. Once finished going through the dialogue you will receive your rewards. ==Rewards== * [[Skis]] * 2 noted [[Half full wine jug]]s * All previous [[birthday event]] and [[anniversary event]] rewards. * Any previous birthday event music track. ==Transcript== {{Hastranscript|event}} ==Gallery== 2022 Birthday event - Al Kharid Palace.png|Al Kharid palace during the event. 2022 Birthday event - Zeke's shop.png|[[Zeke]]'s shop during the event. 2022 Birthday event - Ranael's shop.png|[[Ranael]]'s shop during the event. 2022 Birthday event - Ali Morrisane's stall.png|Ali Morrisane's stall during the event. 2022 Birthday event - Larry's Fishing Contest.png|Big Dave and Larry at the oasis north of the gem trader, decked out with balloons for the festivities. 2022 Birthday event.png|The cookoff area hosted by My Arm. 2022 Birthday event - Capt' Arnav's Treasure Hunt.png|Capt Arnav recruiting adventurers to help him find his treasure chest in front of the bank. 2022 Birthday event - Hassan's new invention.png|Hassan debuts his new invention, the skis. ==Trivia== * When players read [[Osman's report]], the code 75170fc230cd88f32e475ff4087f81d9 is shown. This code is an {{wp|MD5}} hash for a URL that leads players to a YouTube video of {{WP|Rick Astley}}'s hit song, ''[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ Never Gonna Give You Up]''. Such an act is known as {{WP|Rickrolling}}, a famous Internet prank. ** The player points out that [[Ali Morrisane|Ali]]'s passcode question and answer are not very secure, to which [[Osman]] replies that he knows but does not care as Ali has already paid him. * The clues given share the visual appearance of [[Clue scroll (master)|master clue scrolls]], while the [[Zeke's challenge scroll|challenge scroll]] has the same appearance as a [[Clue scroll (beginner)|beginner clue scroll]]. * At the end of the event, [[Hassan]] makes a comment of how sand is coarse, rough, and gets everywhere. This is a reference to the film ''{{wp|Star Wars: Episode II – Attack of the Clones}}'', in which Anakin Skywalker remarks on how he does not like sand. * [[Capt' Arnav]] remarks that it is the 9th Anniversary of Gielinor. When the player replies that Gielinor is much older than that, he counters that it is the 9th anniversary "since we started countin'", a subtle [[fourth wall]] break. *When the intelligence is handed to Ali Morrisane, he says "''...Chocolate? In the desert? Hm... not a terrible idea, but how to stop it from melting...?''", which is a reference to [[Choc-ice]]. * The player can ask [[Hans (2022 Birthday event)|Hans]] about their account's age during the cookout, but he will be too busy to answer until the cookoff is finished. * When answering [[Zeke]]'s challenge scroll, Zeke has special dialogue if the player answers either 0 or over 2,147,483,647 (maximum value of a signed 32-bit integer). * Dialogue during the event changes if the player has completed certain quests. ** Hassan refers to the player as a friend or not a friend of [[Al Kharid]] depending on whether [[Prince Ali Rescue]] is completed. ** [[Big Dave]] recognizes the player if [[Fishing Contest]] is completed. ** If [[Troll Stronghold]] is completed, when Hans recommends burning the [[banana pizza]], the player remembers [[Burntmeat]] the troll, resulting in humourous dialogue where Hans confuses Burntmeat's name for the item [[burnt meat]]. ** [[My Arm]] talks about [[Snowflake]] if [[Making Friends with My Arm]] is completed. {{2022 Birthday event}} {{Events}}
